text: Subject: Wi-Fi Connection Problems in the Office
Since this morning, I have been experiencing difficulties connecting to the Wi-Fi in the office.
Other colleagues apparently have no problems. My laptop finds the network, but the connection is unstable.
Could you please check what the problem might be?

ticket.title: Disruption -> Wi-Fi
ticket.description: Since this morning, I have been experiencing difficulties connecting to the Wi-Fi in the office. My laptop finds the network, but the connection is unstable.

text: Subject: No Wi-Fi Connection After Password Change
I changed my Wi-Fi password, and since then I can no longer connect.
Other devices have no problem. Could you please help me solve this?

ticket.title: Disruption -> Wi-Fi
ticket.description: After changing my Wi-Fi password, I can no longer connect. Other devices have no problem. Please assist.

text: I can't see our company's Wi-Fi network on my laptop.
It was working fine until yesterday. Other networks are visible. What could be the problem?

ticket.title: Disruption -> Network Visibility
ticket.description: Cannot see the company's Wi-Fi network on the laptop, although other networks are visible.

text: I suspect my computer has been infected with malware. It has become very slow and shows unusual pop-ups.
Please advise on what steps I should take.

ticket.title: Security Incident -> Malware
ticket.description: Computer showing symptoms of malware infection - slow performance and unusual pop-ups.

text: I received a notification about an unauthorized access attempt on my account.
I have not shared my credentials with anyone. Could this be a security breach?

ticket.title: Security Incident -> Unauthorized Access
ticket.description: Received a notification about an unauthorized access attempt on the account.

text: I received an email that looks like a phishing attempt. It asks for sensitive information.
I haven't clicked on any links. What should I do?

ticket.title: Security Incident -> Phishing
ticket.description: Received an email that appears to be a phishing attempt, asking for sensitive information.

text: I have noticed some unusual activity in our database. There might be a potential data breach.
Can you please look into this and ensure our data is secure?

ticket.title: Security Incident -> Data Breach
ticket.description: Noticed unusual activity in the database, raising concerns about a potential data breach.

text: I am experiencing very slow internet speeds on my device. This issue is affecting my work.
Could you please check the network?

ticket.title: Disruption -> Internet Speed
ticket.description: Experiencing slow internet speeds, affecting work productivity.

text: My email account has been locked due to multiple failed login attempts.
I need access for urgent work emails. Can you help me unlock it?

ticket.title: Service Request -> Account Unlock
ticket.description: Email account locked after multiple failed login attempts, urgent need for access.

text: I'm unable to connect to the office printer from my computer.
It was working fine yesterday. Can you please assist?

ticket.title: Disruption -> Printer Connection
ticket.description: Cannot connect to the office printer from the computer, no changes made since it last worked.

text: I'm having trouble connecting to the VPN from home.
I followed all the setup instructions but still can't connect.

ticket.title: Disruption -> VPN
ticket.description: Trouble connecting to the VPN from home despite following setup instructions.

text: Subject: Unable to Access Shared Drive
I'm having issues accessing the shared drive from my computer.
This is critical for my team's collaboration. Please provide assistance.

ticket.title: Disruption -> Shared Drive Access
ticket.description: Issues accessing the shared drive, which is critical for team collaboration.

text: I need to have a specific software installed on my workstation for a new project.

ticket.title: Service Request -> Software Installation
ticket.description: Request for installation of specific software on a workstation for a new project.

text: Subject: Update Required for Security Software
Our security software seems outdated and may need an update.
This could be a potential security risk. Can you handle the update?

ticket.title: Service Request -> Software Update
ticket.description: Security software appears outdated and needs an update to mitigate potential risks.

text: My laptop battery drains much faster than usual.
This is hindering my mobility for work. Can you check it?

ticket.title: Disruption -> Hardware
ticket.description: Laptop battery draining faster than usual, affecting work mobility.

text: I'm experiencing problems with my email synchronization on multiple devices.
This is causing delays in communication. Can you provide a solution?

ticket.title: Disruption -> Email Synchronization
ticket.description: Problems with email synchronization across devices, leading to communication delays.

text: My computer is overheating rapidly even with minimal use.
This is concerning for hardware safety. Can you look into it?

ticket.title: Disruption -> Hardware
ticket.description: Computer overheating quickly even with minimal usage, posing a safety concern.

text: Subject: Missing Files on the Network Drive
Some important files are missing from my folder on the network drive.
I suspect accidental deletion or a syncing issue. Can you help recover them?

ticket.title: Service Request -> File Recovery
ticket.description: Important files missing from a folder on the network drive, possibly due to deletion or syncing issues.

text: I need an update to my network access permissions for a new project role.
This is urgent to ensure smooth project progress.

ticket.title: Service Request -> Access Update
ticket.description: Requires an update to network access permissions due to a new project role.

text: Subject: Ransomware Attack on Company Systems
Our company systems have been affected by a ransomware attack.
Immediate assistance is needed to minimize the impact and restore security.

ticket.title: Incident -> Security Incident
ticket.description: Our company systems have been affected by a ransomware attack. Immediate assistance is required to minimize the impact and restore security.
